mapper.insert: insert site_configs ( id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, site, config_key, content, env, status, domains, name, platform) values ( #{id}, now() ,now(), #{site}, #{configKey}, #{content}, #{env}, #{status}, #{domains}, #{name} ,#{platform})
